title: Error
body:
I was getting on League of Legends and apparently I couldn't because of an error code. If anyone knows how to fix it, or if it has happened to any of you, please help me out. This is the link that I got. 
Failed to load URL "https://riot:knt9-CEgsyVMbm9jMGBhHA@127.0.0.1:50219/index.html" with error "unknown error code -21" (-21

replies.body: Hmmmmm that's an interesting error code! As far as I can tell, it seems like you're getting this due to some kind of weird connection error. Go through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to double check for any issues there.
